articles.content:
Meta Platforms, Inc (NASDAQ: META), following the launch of its Quest 3 headset, has decided to reduce the prices of its older Quest 2 headset by $50 permanently.

articles.content:

articles.author: Jitendra Soni
articles.title: Apple revenue falls after not launching new iPads in 2023 - Dexerto
articles.description: Apple has not updated its iPad lineup for a whole year, for the first time in the last 12 years. This has had a direct impact on the company's revenue.
articles.content:
Apple has not updated its iPad lineup for a whole year, for the first time in the last 12 years. This has had a direct impact on the companys revenue.
